snippet.title: SNES Longplay [350] Out of this World
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Mad-Matt

Also known as Another World in eu region. This is the snes port of the great Amiga original. The game is much lower resolution, but it makes up for it with some extra scenes and background music which adds some dramatic effects to whats going on. I do think the ending music in the Amiga original is better and much for fitting to the game.

Only issue with the game is that the gamplay slows right down when there is lots going on. This can add to the difficulty when charging the gun as the timing will be off in low fps areas. Also the lack of countdown timer audio effect during the intro really kills the dramatic effect of the original in this version. Oh and the loading time between checkpoints.... -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
